item.title: Bliss
item.description: Bliss - Blog Template For Eleventy Bliss is a single-column blog template for Eleventy with strong focus on simplicity without sacrificing functionality.

item.title: Eleventy Satisfactory
item.description: Eleventy Satisfactory Blog Theme An opinionated Eleventy blog theme making use of SimpleCSS, with inspiration from Hylia and minimal-mistakes.

item.description: A clean and handcrafted Eleventy Blog Theme Designed for a hyper focused blog.

item.description: Table of Contents Installation Main Features Support Licensing Hire Installation Add the repository into your Eleventy Project repository by git clone https://github.

item.title: Eleventy Yetty
item.description: Yet another starter kit for Eleventy Yetty is yet another Eleventy starter kit for my (& your) new projects.

item.title: Eleventy Soft UI Design
item.description: Open-source starter built with 11ty and prismic CMS Eleventy Soft UI is an Eleventy adaptation of Soft UI Design System (a user-friendly and beautiful design system based on Bootstrap 5), including a Blog system that uses Prismic CMS for content management.

item.title: 11straps
item.description: A combination of Eleventy and Bootstrap 5 11straps combines static site generation via Eleventy and frontend styling via Bootstrap 5.

item.title: Eleventy Hylia Forestry
item.description: Hylia is a lightweight Eleventy starter kit with Forestry CMS pre-configured, so that you can one-click install a progressive, accessible blog in minutes.

item.title: Eleventy Hylia

item.description: A simple theme for blogging This is a simple theme for blogging that can be deployed on Netlify with a click of a button.
